entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
